subject: Chemistry
question_text: Which of the following ions is the strongest oxidizing agent? (Atomic Number of ) 2025 (24 Jan Shift 1) JEE Main 2025 January JEE Main Previous Year Paper MathonGo < < < < < < < < < < < < ΔH ΔS ΔH ΔS ΔH (+ve) ΔS (−ve) ΔH ΔS MnO 2 KNO 3 K 3 MnO 4 K 4 [Mn(OH) 6 ] KMnO 4 K 2 MnO 4 N 2 O 5( g) →2NO 2( g) + 1 2 O 2( g) 50% 5/2 7/2 7/4 3 ) 5 3 3 (s) [Co(NH 3 ) 4 2 ] ⋅Cl ⋅NH 3 [Co(NH 3 ) 3 3 ] ⋅2NH 3 [Co(NH 3 ) 5 2 [Co(NH 3 ) 4 2 ⋅NH 3 Tb = 65, Lu = 71
